required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Comparative Study Between Amlodipine 10mg And 5mg With Hypertension For Whom 5mg Is Insufficient
clinical_study.official_title: A Double-Blind, Comparative Study Between Amlodipine 5mg And 10mg In Patients With Essential Hypertension For Whom Amlodipine 5mg Is Insufficiently Effective

brief_summary.textblock: The changes in the trough systolic blood pressure from the baseline were assessed after 8 weeks of double-blind treatment with amlodipine 10 mg or amlodipine 5 mg

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Systolic Blood Pressure (SBP) From Baseline to Week 8

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Subjects Achieving the Target Blood Pressure Reduction Value at Week 8
Combined Mean Change in SBP From Baseline to Week 6 and Week 8 (Mean by Patient)
Combined Mean Change in DBP From Baseline to Week 6 and Week 8 (Mean by Patient)
Trough Plasma Concentrations of Amlodipine -Amlodipine 5 mg
Number of Subjects Achieving the Target Blood Pressure Reduction Value and Whose SBP Decreased From Baseline by >= 10 mmHg at Week 8
Combined Number of Subjects Achieving the Target Blood Pressure Reduction Value and Whose SBP Decreased From Baseline by >= 10 mmHg at Both Weeks 6 and 8
Combined Number of Subjects Achieving the Target Blood Pressure Reduction Value at Both Weeks 6 and 8
Change in Diastolic Blood Pressure (DBP) From Baseline to Week 8
Trough Plasma Concentrations of Amlodipine -Amlodipine 10 mg

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Untreated Hypertensive Patients: An systolic blood pressure of >=160 mmHg or diastolic blood pressure >=100mmHg.
- Treated Hypertensive Patients: An systolic blood pressure of >=140 mmHg or diastolic blood pressure of >= 90 mmHg.
- Patients with insufficient response to 5 mg of amlodipine in the screening period:Two successive systolic blood pressure measurements at Visit 4 (Week -2) and Visit 5 (Week 0 = baseline) >=140 mmHg
- Patients with a screening treatment compliance rate >= 80%
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subjects with secondary hypertension (renal disease, pheochromocytoma, and Cushing's syndrome, etc.), severe hypertension (systolic blood pressure of 180 mmHg or higher, or diastolic blood pressure of 110 mmHg or higher), and malignant hypertension

link.description: To obtain contact information for a study center near you, click here.

participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: Consent was taken from 414 patients, 356 patients who met the screening criteria received amlodipine 5 mg. After the 8 weeks of screening treatment, patients who met the entry criteria for double-blind period were randomized to either the amlodipine 10 mg group or the amlodipine 5 mg group at a ratio of 1:1.

group.title: Amlodipine 5 mg
group.description: One amlodipine besilate 5 mg tablet and 1 amlodipine besilate 5 mg placebo tablet were administered once daily after breakfast for 8 weeks.

group.title: Amlodipine 10 mg
group.description: Two amlodipine besilate 5 mg tablets were administered once daily after breakfast for 8 weeks.

group.title: Amlodipine 5 mg
group.description: One amlodipine besilate 5 mg tablet and 1 amlodipine besilate 5 mg placebo tablet were administered once daily after breakfast for 8 weeks.

group.title: Amlodipine 10 mg
group.description: Two amlodipine besilate 5 mg tablets were administered once daily after breakfast for 8 weeks.

group.title: Total
group.description: Total of all reporting groups

outcome.title: Change in Systolic Blood Pressure (SBP) From Baseline to Week 8
outcome.description: Mean change in the trough SBP
outcome.population: Full Analysis Set, Last Observation Carried Forward

group.title: Amlodipine 5 mg
group.description: One amlodipine besilate 5 mg tablet and 1 amlodipine besilate 5 mg placebo tablet were administered once daily after breakfast for 8 weeks.

group.title: Amlodipine 10 mg
group.description: Two amlodipine besilate 5 mg tablets were administered once daily after breakfast for 8 weeks.

measure.title: Change in Systolic Blood Pressure (SBP) From Baseline to Week 8
measure.description: Mean change in the trough SBP
measure.population: Full Analysis Set, Last Observation Carried Forward

analysis.groups_desc: The hypothesis of no group differences (null hypothesis) was tested against that of the amlodipine 10 mg arm being superior to the amlodipine 5 mg arm (alternative hypothesis). ANCOVA models with the trough SBP at baseline, body weight, and age as covariates, and the treatment group and study site as factors was used. The test was performed with a significance level of 0.05 (two-sided).

outcome.title: Change in Diastolic Blood Pressure (DBP) From Baseline to Week 8
outcome.description: Mean change in the trough DBP
outcome.population: Full Analysis Set, Last Observation Carried Forward

analysis.groups_desc: The hypothesis of no group differences (null hypothesis) was tested against that of the amlodipine 10 mg arm being superior to the amlodipine 5 mg arm (alternative hypothesis). ANCOVA models with the trough DBP at baseline, body weight, and age as covariates, and the treatment group and study site as factors was used. The test was performed with a significance level of 0.05 (two-sided).

outcome.population: Full Analysis Set, Last Observation Carried Forward

outcome.title: Number of Subjects Achieving the Target Blood Pressure Reduction Value at Week 8
outcome.description: Target blood pressure reduction value based on Japan Society of Hypertension Guidelines for the Management of Hypertension 2004: SBP below 130 mmHg and DBP below 85 mmHg for <=64 years old; SBP below 140 mmHg and DBP below 90 mmHg for >=65 years old
outcome.population: Full Analysis Set, Last Observation Carried Forward

group.title: Amlodipine 5 mg
group.description: One amlodipine besilate 5 mg tablet and 1 amlodipine besilate 5 mg placebo tablet were administered once daily after breakfast for 8 weeks.

group.title: Amlodipine 10 mg
group.description: Two amlodipine besilate 5 mg tablets were administered once daily after breakfast for 8 weeks.

measure.title: Number of Subjects Achieving the Target Blood Pressure Reduction Value at Week 8
measure.description: Target blood pressure reduction value based on Japan Society of Hypertension Guidelines for the Management of Hypertension 2004: SBP below 130 mmHg and DBP below 85 mmHg for <=64 years old; SBP below 140 mmHg and DBP below 90 mmHg for >=65 years old
measure.population: Full Analysis Set, Last Observation Carried Forward

analysis.groups_desc: Proportions of participants (responder rates) were used for the statistical analyses. The hypothesis of no group differences (null hypothesis) was tested against that of the amlodipine 10 mg arm being superior to the amlodipine 5 mg arm (alternative hypothesis). The test was conducted based on a logistic regression model with baseline SBP value and body weight as covariates, and treatment group and age (<=64, >=65) as a factor. The significance level was 0.05 (two-sided).

outcome.title: Combined Number of Subjects Achieving the Target Blood Pressure Reduction Value at Both Weeks 6 and 8
outcome.description: Target blood pressure reduction value based on Japan Society of Hypertension Guidelines for the Management of Hypertension 2004: SBP below 130 mmHg and DBP below 85 mmHg for <=64 years old; SBP below 140 mmHg and DBP below 90 mmHg for >=65 years old
outcome.population: Full Analysis Set, Last Observation Carried Forward

outcome.title: Trough Plasma Concentrations of Amlodipine -Amlodipine 5 mg
outcome.population: Plasma concentration obtained after temporarily dosing discontinuation or not matched with the following conditions were excluded from the analysis; Steady-state condition: at least 80% drug compliance from the previous visit to the day of sampling; Trough condition: samples taken within ±10% of 24 hours from last dosing.

group.title: Baseline
group.description: After once daily administration of amlodipine 5 mg for 8 weeks in the screening period

measure.title: Trough Plasma Concentrations of Amlodipine -Amlodipine 5 mg
measure.population: Plasma concentration obtained after temporarily dosing discontinuation or not matched with the following conditions were excluded from the analysis; Steady-state condition: at least 80% drug compliance from the previous visit to the day of sampling; Trough condition: samples taken within ±10% of 24 hours from last dosing.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: Pfizer has the right to review disclosures, requesting a delay of <60 days. Investigator will postpone single center publications until after disclosure of pooled data (all sites), <12 mo from study completion/termination at all participating sites. Investigator may not disclose previously undisclosed confidential info other than study results.
